content.0: Have you bought a house and want to renovate it? Want to modernize your rooms? Bring aging buildings up to standard?
content.1: GIF-CO SARL offer real estate renovation and refreshment services. Our professional workers are available for painting, masonry, general carpentry, electricity, plumbing, laying of parquet, plastering and partitioning work, insulation work, full layout, kitchen layout, bathroom layout.
